verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: likes] [ARG1: to say the U.S. " is respected again " under his leadership] . The evidence says otherwise . Nonpartisan polls of other countries show a big slide in approval of America abroad . And foreign leaders , initially deferential , are increasingly critical of his " America first " snubs .
